question: Your neighbours have recently written to you to complain about the noise from your houselflat.Write a letter to your neighbours. In your letter,•	explain the reasons for the noise•	apologise•	describe what action you will take
text: I am writing this letter to apologise for the inconvenience which has been caused to you by the ongoing maintenance work in my home. Actually, I had to refit the kitchen as my tenants who lived here earlier had done a lot of damage, besides, I recently got the time to fix the same. Although, the aforesaid task should have been completed by now, however, it is taking longer than anticipated, as one of the assigned workmen met with an accident earlier this week.

Firstly, I am sincerely disheartened for the trouble this is causing to you and your family. I concur that continuous hammering can become unbearable. Nevertheless, I have asked the contractor to align some more people to expedite the aforementioned.

Also, I have been assured that it will be completed within 4-5 days. Additionally, I have requested the agency to reschedule the maintenance for day hours. This way, till the time you will be back from office, the task for the day will already be done hence, won’t cause any further trouble.
Thank you for your understanding and support.
